mapper.select: SELECT NVL(GRADE_NO,'0')AS GRADE_NO, NVL(GRADE_MIDTERM,'0')AS GRADE_MIDTERM, NVL(GRADE_FINAL,'0')AS GRADE_FINAL, NVL(GRADE_ASSIGNMENT,'0')AS GRADE_ASSIGNMENT, NVL(GRADE_ABSENCE,'0')AS GRADE_ABSENCE, ATTEND_NO FROM GRADE WHERE ATTEND_NO=#{attend_no}

SELECT AVG(GRADE_MIDTERM)GRADE_MIDTERM, AVG(GRADE_FINAL) GRADE_FINAL, AVG(GRADE_ASSIGNMENT)GRADE_ASSIGNMENT, AVG(GRADE_ABSENCE)GRADE_ABSENCE FROM GRADE WHERE ATTEND_NO=(SELECT ATTEND_NO FROM ATTEND WHERE LECTURE_CODE = #{lecture_code})
SELECT LECTURE_NAME FROM LECTURE WHERE LECTURE_CODE= #{lecture_code}
